property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, you may put the top card of your deck to your shields face down. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.
